messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Roald Dahl movies ( was nicknames
messages.msgSnippet: We thought Matilda was great. The boys thought it was an incredible anti-school pro-library movie. LOL :-) Jane ... From: Gerard Westenberg
messages.messageBody:
We thought Matilda was great. The boys thought it was an incredible
anti-school pro-library movie. LOL :-) Jane

-----Original Message-----
From: Gerard Westenberg [mailto:westen@...]

Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Roald Dahl movies ( was nicknames

> wants to search for movies based on Dahl books, beyond Willie
> Wonka.
<We thought Matilda was quite good and The Witches was quite bad, >

We also really liked Matilda - and also the movie version of Danny
...Leonie W.

Beth in GA
